vision: A comprehensive transport management system with real-time GPS tracking and Telegram bot integration for efficient logistics operations

target_audience.primary: Logistics dispatchers managing transport fleets for delivery/transportation companies in Russia
secondary: Drivers using Telegram bot for shift management and order updates
Fleet managers analyzing KPIs and driver performance
External contractors integrating via API for order creation

phases.name: Foundation & Technical Debt
phases.description: Complete MVP polish, fix technical debt items, and ensure production stability for core operations

milestones.title: Core Metrics Complete
milestones.description: All placeholder TODO calculations replaced with real implementations, providing accurate KPIs

milestones.title: Contractor API Complete
milestones.description: External contractors can fully utilize API with all required fields and documentation

milestones.title: Production Hardening
milestones.description: System is stable and reliable with comprehensive error handling and monitoring

phases.name: Customer Experience & Visibility
phases.description: Add client-facing tracking and enhance real-time communication for all stakeholders

milestones.title: Customer Delivery Tracking
milestones.description: Recipients can track their deliveries in real-time without app installation

milestones.title: Enhanced Driver Experience
milestones.description: Drivers have improved Telegram bot functionality with navigation and preferences

phases.name: Advanced Operations & Analytics
phases.description: Route optimization, smart assignment, and comprehensive KPI dashboards

milestones.title: Route Optimization Live
milestones.description: Multi-stop route planning with TSP solver and auto-assignment engine

milestones.title: Fleet Analytics Dashboard
milestones.description: Comprehensive KPI dashboards and performance tracking for fleet managers

phases.name: Enterprise & Integration
phases.description: Accounting integration, fleet maintenance, and enterprise-grade features

milestones.title: Financial Integration
milestones.description: 1C accounting integration and professional invoice generation

milestones.title: Fleet Maintenance Complete
milestones.description: Vehicle maintenance and fuel tracking operational

features.title: Driver Rating Calculation System
features.description: Implement real calculation for average driver ratings based on order completion, on-time delivery, and customer feedback. Replace current TODO placeholder with actual aggregation logic.
features.rationale: Addresses technical debt (TODO in stats endpoint) and enables fleet managers to identify top-performing drivers. Manual systems lack performance tracking entirely (pain-4-5).
acceptance_criteria: Average rating is calculated from actual order completion data
Rating considers on-time delivery percentage
Rating displays correctly on driver profile and stats endpoints
Rating updates in real-time as orders are completed
user_stories: As a fleet manager, I want to see accurate driver ratings so that I can identify and reward high-performing drivers
As a dispatcher, I want to know driver reliability so that I can assign critical orders appropriately

features.title: Wait Time Analytics
features.description: Calculate and display average wait times for orders, including pickup wait times and delivery wait times. Track and analyze wait time patterns for operational improvement.
features.rationale: Completes TODO placeholder in stats endpoint. Wait time data is critical for operational efficiency measurement - a key success metric. Manual systems cannot track this (pain-4-5).
acceptance_criteria: Wait time is calculated from order creation to driver assignment
Stats endpoint returns actual wait time averages
Wait time can be filtered by time period (today, week, month)
Historical wait time trends are available for analysis
user_stories: As a fleet manager, I want to track average dispatch time so that I can measure team efficiency
As a dispatcher, I want to see current wait times so that I can prioritize unassigned orders

features.title: Enhanced Contractor Order API
features.description: Extend OrderService to accept additional contractor-specific fields including special instructions, contact details, priority levels, and custom metadata.
features.rationale: Addresses technical debt (TODO for contractor fields). Simple REST API is a competitive differentiator vs Oracle's complex EDI integration requirements (pain-3-2).
acceptance_criteria: API accepts special_instructions field for orders
API accepts multiple contact phone numbers per order
API supports priority levels (urgent, normal, low)
Custom metadata fields can be passed and stored
All new fields are validated and documented in OpenAPI spec
user_stories: As an external contractor, I want to include delivery instructions in my API calls so that drivers have complete information
As an integrator, I want to pass custom metadata so that I can track orders in both systems

features.title: Comprehensive API Documentation
features.description: Create comprehensive API documentation with OpenAPI/Swagger, including examples for all endpoints, authentication flows, and webhook payloads.
features.rationale: Simple API with great docs is a differentiator vs Oracle's integration complexity (pain-3-2). Clear documentation reduces integration friction for contractors.
acceptance_criteria: OpenAPI/Swagger documentation is auto-generated and accessible
All endpoints have request/response examples
Authentication section explains JWT and Telegram validation
Webhook payload formats are documented with examples
user_stories: As an external contractor developer, I want clear API docs so that I can integrate quickly without support tickets
As a system administrator, I want to understand webhook payloads so that I can build integrations

features.title: Production Error Handling & Monitoring
features.description: Implement comprehensive error handling, structured logging, and basic monitoring/alerting for production stability.
features.rationale: References git history issues with API recovery. Production stability is critical for trust. Addresses Oracle TMS performance issues (pain-3-3) by ensuring reliable system operation.
acceptance_criteria: All API endpoints have proper try/catch with structured error responses
Errors are logged with correlation IDs for debugging
Critical errors trigger alerts (email/Telegram)
Health check endpoint returns detailed service status
user_stories: As an operator, I want to be alerted when critical errors occur so that I can respond quickly
As a developer, I want structured logs so that I can debug production issues efficiently

features.title: Customer Delivery Tracking Portal
features.description: Create a lightweight web page where delivery recipients can track their order status and driver location in real-time using a unique tracking link. No login required.
features.rationale: Directly addresses known gap 'No client-facing app for delivery recipients'. Major differentiator vs manual systems (pain-4-1) that have no real-time visibility.
acceptance_criteria: Unique tracking URLs are generated for each order
Tracking page shows current order status (pending, in-transit, delivered)
Real-time driver location shown on map when en-route
Estimated arrival time displayed and updated dynamically
Works on mobile browsers without app installation
user_stories: As a delivery recipient, I want to track my order in real-time so that I know when to expect my delivery
As a dispatcher, I want to send tracking links to customers so that they can self-serve status updates

features.title: Customer Notification System
features.description: Automated notifications to customers for key order events: order confirmed, driver assigned, driver en-route, approaching delivery, delivered. Support Telegram and webhook channels.
features.rationale: Eliminates manual phone/SMS communication pain point (pain-4-3). Proactive notifications reduce 'where is my order' calls and improve customer satisfaction.
acceptance_criteria: Automatic notification on order status changes
Configurable notification preferences per order or customer
Support for Telegram messaging to customers
Webhook notifications for custom integrations
ETA updates when driver is approaching
user_stories: As a customer, I want to receive updates about my delivery so that I don't need to call for status
As a dispatcher, I want automatic notifications so that I spend less time on status calls

features.title: Driver Navigation Integration
features.description: Deep-link to navigation apps (Yandex Navigator, 2GIS, Google Maps) from Telegram bot with destination pre-filled. Single-tap navigation start for drivers.
features.rationale: Enhances Telegram-native driver experience which is core differentiator. Reduces friction vs dedicated apps (pain-5-1, pain-1-3) by leveraging existing navigation apps.
acceptance_criteria: Order details in Telegram include 'Navigate' button
Navigation opens in driver's preferred navigation app
Supports Yandex Navigator, 2GIS, and Google Maps
Destination coordinates are pre-filled
Works on both Android and iOS devices
user_stories: As a driver, I want to quickly navigate to my next pickup so that I don't waste time entering addresses
As a driver, I want to use my preferred navigation app so that I have familiar interface

features.title: Driver Shift Planning & Preferences
features.description: Allow drivers to set availability windows, preferred zones, and maximum orders per shift via Telegram bot. System considers preferences when suggesting assignments.
features.rationale: Improves driver adoption and satisfaction with Telegram-native experience. Enterprise solutions require complex apps for this (pain-5-1, pain-2-3), while manual systems can't handle it.
acceptance_criteria: Drivers can set available hours for each day via Telegram
Drivers can specify preferred pickup/delivery zones
Maximum orders per shift can be configured
Dispatcher sees driver preferences when assigning orders
System warns when assigning outside driver preferences
user_stories: As a driver, I want to set my available hours so that I only get orders when I can work
As a dispatcher, I want to see driver preferences so that I can make appropriate assignments

features.title: Enhanced Telegram Notifications
features.description: Improve Telegram notifications with rich formatting, quick action buttons, and smart notification timing to reduce driver distraction.
features.rationale: Telegram-native experience is key differentiator. Better notifications improve driver efficiency vs competitors' mobile apps (pain-5-1) which create app fatigue.
acceptance_criteria: Notifications include formatted order details with address
Inline buttons for quick actions (Accept, Decline, View Map)
Smart batching to avoid notification fatigue
Sound/vibration settings configurable per notification type
user_stories: As a driver, I want clear notifications so that I can quickly understand new orders
As a driver, I want quick action buttons so that I can respond without opening the full app

features.title: Multi-Stop Route Optimizer (TSP Solver)
features.description: Implement Traveling Salesman Problem solver to optimize order sequences for drivers with multiple stops. Calculate optimal pickup and delivery order to minimize total distance/time.
features.rationale: Directly addresses known gap 'No TSP/VRP solver'. Manual systems (pain-4-4) cannot optimize routes. Provides professional-grade optimization without enterprise costs (pain-2-1).
acceptance_criteria: System can optimize sequence of 5-20 stops per driver
Considers pickup-before-delivery constraints
Accounts for time windows when specified
Optimization runs in under 5 seconds for typical loads
Total distance/time savings shown vs original sequence
user_stories: As a dispatcher, I want automatic route optimization so that drivers complete more orders with less driving
As a fleet manager, I want to reduce fuel costs through better route planning

features.title: Smart Auto-Assignment Engine
features.description: Intelligent automatic order assignment based on driver location, availability, current load, and proximity. Configurable rules engine with manual override option.
features.rationale: Eliminates manual assignment pain points and scheduling conflicts (pain-4-2). Reduces dispatcher workload significantly. Enterprise systems have this but are expensive (pain-2-1).
acceptance_criteria: System suggests best driver based on configurable criteria
Proximity to pickup location is primary factor
Current driver load and availability considered
Dispatcher can accept, modify, or reject suggestions
Bulk assignment for multiple orders supported
user_stories: As a dispatcher, I want automatic driver suggestions so that I can assign orders faster
As a fleet manager, I want fair workload distribution so that all drivers get appropriate orders

features.title: KPI Dashboard for Fleet Managers
features.description: Comprehensive analytics dashboard showing fleet performance: orders per day, on-time delivery rate, driver utilization, average trip distance, cost per delivery, and trend analysis.
features.rationale: Fleet managers are key persona who need analytics. Manual systems (pain-4-5) cannot provide this data. Addresses market need for data-driven fleet management without enterprise cost (pain-2-1).
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows daily/weekly/monthly order volumes
On-time delivery percentage tracked and displayed
Driver utilization rates calculated and shown
Average trip distance and duration metrics
Trends visualized with charts over time
user_stories: As a fleet manager, I want to see key metrics so that I can identify areas for improvement
As a business owner, I want cost tracking so that I can optimize profitability

features.title: Driver Performance Leaderboard
features.description: Gamified driver performance tracking with rankings, achievements, and performance badges. Visible to drivers via Telegram and managers via dashboard.
features.rationale: Motivates driver performance improvement. Leverages Telegram-native experience for driver engagement. Simpler than complex enterprise training systems (pain-2-3).
acceptance_criteria: Weekly and monthly driver rankings calculated
Rankings based on orders completed, on-time rate, and rating
Drivers can view their rank via Telegram bot
Achievements for milestones (100 orders, perfect week, etc.)
Manager dashboard shows leaderboard with all drivers
user_stories: As a driver, I want to see how I rank so that I'm motivated to improve
As a fleet manager, I want to recognize top performers so that I can reward excellence

features.title: Photo Proof of Delivery
features.description: Enable drivers to capture and upload photo proof of delivery through Telegram bot. Photos are stored and accessible on order details for dispute resolution.
features.rationale: Proof of delivery reduces disputes and provides audit trail. Uses Telegram's native photo capabilities - no separate app needed (pain-5-1).
acceptance_criteria: Driver can upload photo via Telegram bot on order completion
Photo is stored and linked to order record
Dispatchers can view photos in order details
Photos are timestamped and geotagged
user_stories: As a driver, I want to take delivery photos so that I have proof of delivery
As a dispatcher, I want to see delivery photos so that I can resolve disputes

features.title: 1C Accounting Integration
features.description: Bidirectional integration with 1C:Enterprise for Russian accounting compliance. Sync orders, generate invoices, and exchange financial documents.
features.rationale: Addresses known gap 'No accounting integration'. 1C is dominant in Russia. Enterprise TMS have accounting but are too expensive (pain-2-1) and complex (pain-2-2).
acceptance_criteria: Completed orders sync to 1C automatically
Invoices generated in Russian legal format
Contractor payments tracked and exported
Driver earnings exported for payroll
Support for 1C:Предприятие 8.x versions
user_stories: As an accountant, I want automatic invoice generation so that I don't need to manually enter data
As a business owner, I want 1C integration so that my logistics and accounting are synchronized

features.title: Invoice & Document Generation
features.description: Generate professional invoices, waybills, and delivery receipts in PDF format. Support Russian document formats (счёт-фактура, накладная, ТТН).
features.rationale: Standalone invoice generation for companies not using 1C. Addresses accounting gap. Manual systems require separate document creation (pain-4-4).
acceptance_criteria: Generate PDF invoices from order data
Russian legal document formats supported
Company logo and details customizable
Batch invoice generation for periods
Email delivery of documents
user_stories: As a dispatcher, I want to generate delivery documents so that drivers have proper paperwork
As an accountant, I want invoice PDFs so that I can send to customers

features.title: Vehicle Fuel Tracking
features.description: Track fuel consumption per vehicle and per trip. Record fuel purchases, calculate cost per kilometer, and detect anomalies indicating fuel theft or inefficiency.
features.rationale: Addresses known gap 'No fuel/maintenance tracking'. Essential for fleet cost management. Enterprise TMS are expensive (pain-2-1), manual systems cannot track (pain-4-5).
acceptance_criteria: Drivers can log fuel purchases via Telegram
Fuel consumption calculated per trip and per vehicle
Cost per kilometer metrics available
Anomaly detection for unusual consumption
Reports for fuel expense tracking
user_stories: As a fleet manager, I want to track fuel costs so that I can identify inefficient vehicles
As a driver, I want to easily log fuel purchases so that records are accurate

features.title: Vehicle Maintenance Scheduler
features.description: Track vehicle maintenance schedules based on mileage and time. Send reminders for upcoming service, log maintenance history, and track costs.
features.rationale: Addresses known gap 'No fuel/maintenance tracking'. Prevents costly breakdowns and ensures compliance. Enterprise feature made accessible without cost (pain-2-1).
acceptance_criteria: Service schedules based on mileage intervals
Time-based maintenance reminders
Maintenance history log per vehicle
Cost tracking for repairs and service
Telegram alerts for upcoming maintenance
user_stories: As a fleet manager, I want maintenance reminders so that vehicles are properly serviced
As a mechanic, I want maintenance history so that I can diagnose issues quickly

features.title: Data Sovereignty & Self-Hosting Documentation
features.description: Comprehensive documentation and tools for self-hosted deployment, emphasizing data sovereignty benefits. Include security hardening guides and compliance checklists.
features.rationale: Addresses major competitor pain points: sanctions/data localization for Oracle (pain-3-4), vendor lock-in for Yandex (pain-1-1), and cloud privacy concerns (pain-5-3).
acceptance_criteria: Complete deployment guide for self-hosted installation
Security hardening checklist included
Russian data law compliance documentation
Backup and disaster recovery procedures documented
Upgrade and migration guides available
user_stories: As an IT administrator, I want clear deployment docs so that I can set up TMS on our servers
As a business owner, I want compliance documentation so that I can verify legal requirements are met
